title: North Korea's Kim Jong-un orders 'mass production' of suicide attack drones
content: Kim Jong Un, the leader of North Korea, has ordered the mass production of suicide attack drones following a successful test. These drones, designed to strike land and sea targets, are intended to bolster North Korea's military capabilities and are being manufactured at a rapid pace.
summary: Kim Jong Un, the leader of North Korea, has ordered the mass production of suicide attack drones following a successful test. These drones, designed to strike land and sea targets, are intended to bolster North Korea's military capabilities and are being manufactured at a rapid pace.

title: China's president unveils a megaport in Peru, but locals say they're being left out
Investigators assess if Netanyahu’s aides forged Oct 7 phone records
content: Following a major security failure that allowed Hamas to launch a surprise attack on Israel last year, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office is embroiled in scandal. Aides to the PM are accused of tampering with official records, including details about a crucial phone call with a top general who warned of the impending invasion.
summary: Following a major security failure that allowed Hamas to launch a surprise attack on Israel last year, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office is embroiled in scandal. Aides to the PM are accused of tampering with official records, including details about a crucial phone call with a top general who warned of the impending invasion.

title: Remove words ‘secularism’ & ‘socialism’ from Bangladesh statute: AG
content: Bangladesh's Attorney General, Md Asaduzzaman, sparked controversy by advocating for the removal of "socialism" and "secularism" from the constitution. He argued that these principles contradict the nation's predominantly Muslim identity. Asaduzzaman's proposal, made during a hearing on the validity of the 15th amendment, ignited debate about the country's future direction and drew criticism from legal experts.
summary: Bangladesh's Attorney General, Md Asaduzzaman, sparked controversy by advocating for the removal of "socialism" and "secularism" from the constitution. He argued that these principles contradict the nation's predominantly Muslim identity. Asaduzzaman's proposal, made during a hearing on the validity of the 15th amendment, ignited debate about the country's future direction and drew criticism from legal experts.

title: ‘When seen from space, there’s a sense that Earth is everything we have’: Booker winner
content: In a conversation about her Booker Prize-winning novel 'Orbital,' author Samantha Harvey delved into the process of depicting Earth from the perspective of astronauts aboard the International Space Station. She highlighted the awe-inspiring beauty and fragility of our planet when viewed from space, emphasizing the importance of protecting our home.
summary: In a conversation about her Booker Prize-winning novel 'Orbital,' author Samantha Harvey delved into the process of depicting Earth from the perspective of astronauts aboard the International Space Station.  She highlighted the awe-inspiring beauty and fragility of our planet when viewed from space, emphasizing the importance of protecting our home.

title: Elon Musk enters diplomatic arena to defuse tensions between Washington & Tehran under Donald Trump
content: Elon Musk, a close associate of President-elect Donald Trump, recently met with Iran's UN Ambassador, Amir Saeid Iravani, to discuss easing US-Iran tensions. The meeting, described as "positive" by anonymous Iranian sources, could signal Trump's willingness to pursue diplomacy with Iran. During the meeting, Iravani reportedly requested Musk to advocate for US sanctions exemptions and explore business opportunities in Iran.
summary: Elon Musk, a close associate of President-elect Donald Trump, recently met with Iran's UN Ambassador, Amir Saeid Iravani, to discuss easing US-Iran tensions. The meeting, described as "positive" by anonymous Iranian sources, could signal Trump's willingness to pursue diplomacy with Iran.  During the meeting, Iravani reportedly requested Musk to advocate for US sanctions exemptions and explore business opportunities in Iran.

title: Trump nominates ex-SEC chair Jay Clayton for Manhattan's chief prosecutor role
content: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Jay Clayton, a former SEC Chairman with expertise in mergers and capital-raising, for the position of chief federal prosecutor in Manhattan. The selection is notable due to Clayton's lack of experience in criminal law, a key area for the Southern District of New York's US Attorney's office, known for handling major financial crime cases.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Jay Clayton, a former SEC Chairman with expertise in mergers and capital-raising, for the position of chief federal prosecutor in Manhattan. The selection is notable due to Clayton's lack of experience in criminal law, a key area for the Southern District of New York's US Attorney's office, known for handling major financial crime cases.

title: US federal court upholds Indiana law banning puberty blockers for transgender youth
content: The 7th US circuit court of appeals upheld an Indiana law banning puberty blockers and hormone therapy for transgender youth. The court ruled that the law does not discriminate based on sex and that parents lack an absolute right to choose any medical treatment for their children.
summary: The 7th US circuit court of appeals upheld an Indiana law banning puberty blockers and hormone therapy for transgender youth. The court ruled that the law does not discriminate based on sex and that parents lack an absolute right to choose any medical treatment for their children.

title: Trump picks Robert F Kennedy Jr as secretary of health and human services
content: Donald Trump has appointed Robert F Kennedy Jr as the secretary of health and human services. Kennedy, an environmental activist, previously endorsed Trump and will focus on addressing chronic diseases, reducing chemicals in food, and reforming the FDA. However, his stance on vaccines has drawn criticism and accusations of spreading misinformation.
summary: Donald Trump has appointed Robert F Kennedy Jr as the secretary of health and human services. Kennedy, an environmental activist, previously endorsed Trump and will focus on addressing chronic diseases, reducing chemicals in food, and reforming the FDA. However, his stance on vaccines has drawn criticism and accusations of spreading misinformation.

title: Queen Camilla comments on her smoking habit after chest infection: 'I quit...'
content: Queen Camilla of Britain is recovering after a chest infection led her to miss several engagements, including Remembrance events. She has returned to royal duties, recently attending a Buckingham Palace reception where she chatted with actress Emily Mortimer about their mothers' shared smoking habit. Camilla, who quit smoking two decades ago, joked with Mortimer about her mother's continued smoking.
summary: Queen Camilla of Britain is recovering after a chest infection led her to miss several engagements, including Remembrance events. She has returned to royal duties, recently attending a Buckingham Palace reception where she chatted with actress Emily Mortimer about their mothers' shared smoking habit. Camilla, who quit smoking two decades ago, joked with Mortimer about her mother's continued smoking.

title: Did AOC remove her pronouns from X bio? Here's what happened
content: "AOC removing the pronouns from her bio is a hell of a vibe shift," one social media user posted. X's community notes, however, suggested that AOC did not remove her pronouns after the election results, she might have done this months ago but came to the notice now. Republican leader Marjorie Taylor Greene said AOC needs to explain her action "after shoving gender lies and insane ideology down people’s throats for years, why has she removed her pronouns?".
summary: "AOC removing the pronouns from her bio is a hell of a vibe shift," one social media user posted. X's community notes, however, suggested that AOC did not remove her pronouns after the election results, she might have done this months ago but came to the notice now. Republican leader Marjorie Taylor Greene said AOC needs to explain her action "after shoving gender lies and insane ideology down people’s throats for years, why has she removed her pronouns?".

title: Trump rules out JP Morgan's Jamie Dimon for administration role
content: Despite earlier speculation of Jamie Dimon being considered for the Treasury Secretary position, US President-elect Donald Trump confirmed that Dimon will not be joining his administration. Dimon, CEO of JPMorgan Chase, had previously indicated his unwillingness to accept a government role.
summary: Despite earlier speculation of Jamie Dimon being considered for the Treasury Secretary position, US President-elect Donald Trump confirmed that Dimon will not be joining his administration. Dimon, CEO of JPMorgan Chase, had previously indicated his unwillingness to accept a government role.

title: Whoopi Goldberg claims she was denied her birthday treats because of politics, bakery responds
content: Whoopi Goldberg alleged that a New York City bakery, later identified as Holtermann's Bakery, refused to bake her birthday desserts due to her political views. The bakery denied the claim, citing boiler problems. "They said that their ovens had gone down, all kinds of stuff, but folks went and got them anyway,” Goldberg explained, “which is why I'm not telling you who made them," Goldberg said.
summary: Whoopi Goldberg alleged that a New York City bakery, later identified as Holtermann's Bakery, refused to bake her birthday desserts due to her political views. The bakery denied the claim, citing boiler problems. "They said that their ovens had gone down, all kinds of stuff, but folks went and got them anyway,” Goldberg explained, “which is why I'm not telling you who made them," Goldberg said.

title: Elon Musk's college photo goes viral after Trump appoints him to lead DOGE
content: A vintage photo of Elon Musk from his college days resurfaced on social media, sparking widespread reactions. The photo emerged following the announcement of Musk co-leading the 'Department of Government Efficiency' (DOGE) in the upcoming Trump administration. Musk himself acknowledged the photo, expressing amazement at his journey.
summary: A vintage photo of Elon Musk from his college days resurfaced on social media, sparking widespread reactions. The photo emerged following the announcement of Musk co-leading the 'Department of Government Efficiency' (DOGE) in the upcoming Trump administration. Musk himself acknowledged the photo, expressing amazement at his journey.

title: Nikki Haley says she knows Trump's game: 'He knew I have no interest'
content: Haley said she told Witkoff that no truce was needed and she was not revolting against Trump but was supporting him and in exchange she did not want anything. “I told him at the time there was no truce needed, that Trump had my support. There was no issue on my end. At that point, he was like, ‘What do you want? Tell me what you want. Is there anything you want?’ I said, ‘There’s nothing I want.’”
summary: Haley said she told Witkoff that no truce was needed and she was not revolting against Trump but was supporting him and in exchange she did not want anything. “I told him at the time there was no truce needed, that Trump had my support. There was no issue on my end. At that point, he was like, ‘What do you want? Tell me what you want. Is there anything you want?’ I said, ‘There’s nothing I want.’”

title: British Hindus and Indians raise concerns over Oxford Union Kashmir debate speakers' alleged link to terrorism
content: INSIGHT UK, a British Indian social movement, has formally objected to the Oxford Union's decision to host a debate on Kashmiri independence. Their concern stems from the invited speakers, Muzzammil Ayyub Thakur and Zafar Khan, who allegedly have ties to extremist groups.
summary: INSIGHT UK, a British Indian social movement, has formally objected to the Oxford Union's decision to host a debate on Kashmiri independence. Their concern stems from the invited speakers, Muzzammil Ayyub Thakur and Zafar Khan, who allegedly have ties to extremist groups.

title: Finally, Prince Harry may return to the Royal Family as his biggest enemy is retiring
content: Tina Brown wrote that Harry and Alderton had a personal enmity and that dominated Alderton's advice to King Charles to not welcome Harry back to the royal fold. The replacement of Alderton by a figure without any personal animosity with Harry could "create a new, friendlier path for negotiations with Harry". In his memoir Spare, Harry christened Alderton as "The Wasp" -- such is the extent of their enmity.
summary: Tina Brown wrote that Harry and Alderton had a personal enmity and that dominated Alderton's advice to King Charles to not welcome Harry back to the royal fold. The replacement of Alderton by a figure without any personal animosity with Harry could "create a new, friendlier path for negotiations with Harry". In his memoir Spare, Harry christened Alderton as "The Wasp" -- such is the extent of their enmity.

title: 'Matt Gaetz college roommate' rumor resurfaces on X after Trump names him as attorney general
content: Apart from a sex trafficking case, Matt Gaetz was linked to the unnatural death of his roommate at Florida State University but the case was ruled as a suicide. Now that he has been named as the attorney general, the rumor resurfaced on social media. Republican leaders are certain that Gaetz won't get confirmed by the Senate. Gaetz needs a Senate majority to become the attorney general.
summary: Apart from a sex trafficking case, Matt Gaetz was linked to the unnatural death of his roommate at Florida State University but the case was ruled as a suicide. Now that he has been named as the attorney general, the rumor resurfaced on social media. Republican leaders are certain that Gaetz won't get confirmed by the Senate. Gaetz needs a Senate majority to become the attorney general.

title: Police find up to 20 human skulls in New Mexico residence, link one to missing woman
content: Police in New Mexico made a chilling discovery of up to 20 human skulls in a home in Jal, potentially linked to the 2019 disappearance of Angela McManes. The investigation began when a resident reported a disturbing encounter with Cecil Villanueva, who allegedly discarded bags containing human bones.
summary: Police in New Mexico made a chilling discovery of up to 20 human skulls in a home in Jal, potentially linked to the 2019 disappearance of Angela McManes. The investigation began when a resident reported a disturbing encounter with Cecil Villanueva, who allegedly discarded bags containing human bones.

title: 2 Israeli airstrikes hit Syria's capital and suburb, killing 15 people, Syrian state media says
